name: eMuze
overview:
eMuze, LLC is a media technology company headquartered in Boston, MA. eMuze recently launched its core flagship property, eMuze Connect (www.emuze.com), which provides a destination for discovering and sharing the content you love from today’s best artists and entertainers. Whether you are a fan of music, fashion, film or art, emuze simplifies your search for new content by collecting all the music, videos, photos and statuses you care about in one place. emuze empowers you - the fan, curator and trendsetter - with the ability to break artists and entertainers you’re passionate about and share their content with the world.

eMuze owns and operates eMuze Connect (www.emuze.com); Verge Campus, a national Marketing and Brand Rep Program; CMDY.com, an online comedy-focused discovery platform; and the Verge Campus Tour, an all-inclusive National Collegiate Music Tour which recently hit 27 colleges nationwide with headliners Kendrick Lamar & Steve Aoki.
